Nota: DÃ³

This game had so much potentional to become a truly outstanding experience in gaming, but of course corporate greed comes along to end all that and take away the main selling point of the entire reason the game ever had a 2 in the name. Now we have a cash grab of a game. What were devs doing for the entire time the game was being worked on? Monetization? They couldve done that and gotten more players to play their game and gotten more profits in the process but of course companies love to cut corners and only ever make a decision based off of profit. The universe of the game is great and intriguing with all the diverse characters but the game fails to do what it intends to do. The lore of the game is one of my favorite parts of the game like the voice lines at the beginning of the match. The profit incentive are the skins that sell for 20 bucks each for the most part so why would they sell a 60 dollar full length replayable pve side of the game when they can just do 1/15 of the work and make a skin that sells for a 1/3 of the game.
Downloaded this game on steam just so I could leave this review.

As someone with over 1000 hours in this game. I wouldn't give this developer a cent of your hard-earned cash.

What used to be a very fulfilling game, rich with content has turned into a predatory cash grab.
